title: Transportation
creator_credit: Elaine Larison, Jim Larison and National Geographic Society
brief_description: This film illustrates some of the ways in which transportation affects - even shapes - our lives. Explores many modes of transportation, from private such as bicycles or cars, to public mass transit, such as buses and trains. Also looks at aeroplane, railroad and ship transport. Suitable for Middle-Upper Primary level students. Teacher’s guide included.
